channel.title: Game stops working shortly after start
channel.description:
I just bought the game and after starting the game (both versions) crash shortly after the first sequence. (No error message whatsoever, game just stops working.)
Well and since im kinda stupid when it comes to game crashes I figured I´ll just ask here. And when nothing comes out I can still refund.
I appreciate any help :)

item.title: Game stops working shortly after start
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.source: Game stops working shortly after start

item.title: Game stops working shortly after start
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
OH! You mean the game says it’s not responding while loading the login screen? If that’s the case, many people have this “issue” but it’s just unity loading its libraries. So that basically is not a really big issue, you shouldn’t have problems during the game it’s most likely just that you have low specs.

Read full topic
item.source: Game stops working shortly after start

item.title: Game stops working shortly after start
item.dc:creator: Envi
item.description:
Well it works now just have to wait for like 3-4 Minutes and the games suddenly starts. Which is odd but i dont want to bother people with that stuff. So all good now can play.

Read full topic
item.source: Game stops working shortly after start

item.title: Game stops working shortly after start
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
We’ll also need your specs. CPU /GPU /RAM /OS

Read full topic

item.title: Game stops working shortly after start
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
http://i.imgur.com/r3ehCAL.png

Post the crash dumps if you have them, or the output log if you don’t, might help narrow down what happened when the devs see this.

Read full topic
